pullRequest.title: Report field name when decoding Elasticsearch value fails

nodes.bodyText:
i think value.getClass() is more helpful than value.toString()
for example you may get
Expected a numeric value for field 'my_col' of type BIGINT: 42

and this would be not much more useful than the message without "42"
i saw your comment  in #3321 (comment)
i still think we should include both: value.toString and value type.
If not for end-users, this be useful for us to provide help when they show up with an error.

commit.message: Report field name when decoding Elasticsearch value fails

afterCommit.message: Report field name when decoding Elasticsearch value fails
